consultation.title: 30 Minutes Data Assessment Call
consultation.subtitle: This 30-minute consultation is designed to understand your data operations challenges and determine the right next steps for your project.

benefits.2: An initial assessment of your data infrastructure and tech stack
benefits.3: Insights on feasibility, scope, and next steps
benefits.4: Clarity on next steps for your project or recommend alternatives
